testcase.name: Validate User navigates to Landing Page
testcase.system-out: Given chrome is launched and Opencart is launched...........................passed Then User navigates on Landing Page.........................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Landing Page UI
testcase.system-out: Given chrome is launched and Opencart is launched...........................passed Then User navigates on Landing page.........................................passed And fields are visible on the Landing page..................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Landing page fields(Login button is clickable)
testcase.system-out: Given chrome is launched and Opencart is launched...........................passed Then User navigates on Landing page.........................................passed When User clicks on login button............................................passed Then Login button is clickable and User navigates to login page.............passed
